overview:
Noel Manoj is a Strategy professional in the space of Media, Technology & Entertainment.

Noel Manoj has over 5 years of experience in the ‘Telecommunications, Digital Media & Entertainment’ business sectors.

His expertise includes Consumer Market Operations, After-Market Analysis, Negotiations-Strategic Partnerships, Mobile Monetization, Internet Monetization Strategy, Start-ups & New Product Marketing.

Noel attended grad school at the University of Melbourne and also holds a MBA from the Indian School of Business, Hyderabad.

His special interests include Extra Terrestrial Life, Emerging Market trends, Diplomacy & Public Policy.

Specialties Partner management, Marketing for Technology firms, Negotiating Strategic Alliances, Digital Marketing expertise-Internet & Mobile, Web 2.0, Go-to-market strategy & New Product Marketing
